comments.comment: Seeing Pewd's son grow up along with Felix grow old with us, almost feels watching family grow all together
I love that Bjorn is always smiling towards the camera because Marzia is filming. So adorable.

Kid is so set for life. Great statistics on multi-lingual kids. Growing up in Japanese culture, with English, Swedish, and Italian speaking will make this kid super smart. Plus he has two great parents. Really glad to see such a happy character arc for Felix and his family. Frankly we're lucky to share the joy.

from a dumb 11 year old to a 24 year old aircraft mechanic I've been watching your goofy ass for over a decade and it feels great knowing that even if youtube shuts off tomorrow you'll be just fine pewds.

Pewds: "Does he look like me now?" 
Marzia: "He always does." 

That was the most precious thing I've ever heard. 0:14
5:55 the way felix laughs exactly like his dad is so wholesome
That kid is blessed, to have both parents 24*7 loving and pampering him. Bless this sweet family and wish all happiness
赤さんが可愛いし家族皆幸せそうだし穏やかで、めちゃ癒やさる
At the end of the video I realized my face is hurting, because I was smiling all the way through!
God I love retired pewds. I was smiling the whole time. It's almost cathartic seeing him at peace and loving his family. Crazy to think I've grown up with him. I still rewatch my fav gameplays.

My little brother was the biggest pewdiepie fan.. he even was pursuing a degree in video game design and development because of felix. He passed away in 2017 during his first year of college. Since he died, I felt this weird responsibility to watch every new upload of felix's.. just because I knew thats what he would have been doing. All of that to say, I wish he could see this chapter of pewdiepie  living his best life.. "retired" in japan and best of all becoming a dad. You can truly tell how happy he is and it really warms my heart. I might have started watching because of my brother.. but ive became a fan now too and I look forward to these cozy little update videos

Man depressed
Man opens YouTube 
Man sees PewDiePie with his family 
Man happy
Seeing his son grow up and also Felix having fun with his Grandparents just melts my heart. Much love!
7:00 Three generations in one frame... Amazingly beautiful!

Felix in Dad mode is my favorite thing. He looks so happy. Ive had coworkers who are seeming not very animated then their wife and young kid comes to visit them at work and they light up like ive never seen.

THIS is how family channels should be made...not shoving the camera in the kids face 24/7, but still capturing moments with Bjorn and the family as they live their lives. That kid will grow up to be so humble

Bjorn is 1000% the cutest baby I’ve ever seen. Joy is radiating off you, Felix. I don’t check in often but it’s been so wonderful to see how your lives have transformed. You’re really living the dream and it’s amazing to see. I’m so happy for you and Marzia!

I love seeing my childhood idol happy, without any boxing fights, without clowning around. Simply put, you started a family and you are very happy.  You fill the void with your peaceful life. Keep it up.
Father-Son moment is so wholesome man!!!

3:29 his excitement is immeasurable

Wait- am i crying rn
the way that the baby is always looking at Marzia is so sweet, he loves his mommy (and daddy too ofc)

9:21 HOLY crap, It was just yesterday Felix was a skinny little kid, playing video games, now he is top tier dad ik ik but this shot just perfectly captures his Dad-ness, Baby on shoulders the glasses the facial hair, band aide on the finger, sipping coffer looking down presuming at a Newspaper
I can already  imagine their son speaking italian swedish japanese and english. the kid has the greatest future ahead of him

トップユーチューバーが、日本で幸せそうに生活してるのを見るのは、嬉しい。
願わくば、このまま日本のマスコミや、迷惑なYouTuberなどに邪魔されずピースフルに生活を楽しんでいただきたい。
Its wholesome to see Felix go from a gamer in 2010 to living dream life in Japan with Marzia

I can't explain how happy I am seeing Felix's family vlogs. He literally completed life and just doing side quests now. It gives me so much joy I don't know how to explain it. Watching their vlogs makes me calm for some reason, like I'm one of their family or something. Marzia's editing is chef's kiss.
Björn is such a happy baby, u can't help but smile every time you see him.
ピューディパイが日本で幸せそうで良かったっていつも思う日本人
Bjorn's little eyes keep looking for mum and the camera, so cute. He's a star
Björn looks like such a happy kid. I can tell Felix and Marzia are great parents!

Bro literally complete life.

Like seriously, i found it rare because all thing literally balance. Not too much, just enough to make life more beautiful each day.

Very glad to see that Marzia still has that impecable taste for "things out of the ordinary" during the arcade game bit. Tbh I absolutely adore this type of content, it makes me feel so happy for them and super relaxed with the bgm.

I freaking love these vlogs man. A happy father, a happy mother, a happy son, and happy grandparents. I hope they keep doing this so we can see Björn grow up but I understand if they ever stop all of the sudden.

Felix was like an older brother to a lot of us that didn't have that type of guidance growing up. Too see him with a family now and looking genuinely happy is such a welcome sight for someone that has brought similar feelings to countless others. That kid will probably be the most protected human on the planet.
You can tell his parents are amazing grandparents!! I love this so much!!

Pewdiepieが居る日本はなんかおしゃれに見える
幸福感に溢れていて良い動画をいつも有難うやで
Man.. This is probably very close to what genuine, true happiness looks like. I'm kind of jealous, but also happy for you. What a beautiful life!

Pewds is really Living the dream now. Just constantly creating memories with your loved ones always having adventures and not tied down with a regular 9-5 keeping you away from Bjorn love to see it. GOALS!
I love seeing Felix and Mariza being such good parents for Bjorn! He looks like such a sweet baby! His smile is so cute! I love seeing these updates on y’all!
5:52 so nice of Jurgen Klopp coming to visit
Face hurts so much from smiling, what a wholesome family. Love seeing Felix being a Dad, just missing Dad jokes
I love watching Björn grow into his little face and personality. Truly precious
Seeing your parents with their grand baby.  just precious.
3:21 is just the cutest shot of Bjorn
I've never wanted to have my own child so badly. it makes me tear up to see the pure joy you've both worked so hard for
Björn is a lucky boy. He will love watching these videos when he's older. Video evidence of how much his parents love him, and love each other x
Broo his son is ADORABLE! Time passes so fast..
歩ける様になるのが本当に楽しみ

It’s sad having your parents live away when you have kids. Every time they see them they are always so much bigger. Last time my son saw his grandparents he was a newborn, now he is turning 5 months tomorrow. It’s so sweet and sad seeing how fast your baby grows. He’s so big.️️

That baby is gonna be so well diverse in language man! He’s gonna know English, Japanese, Swedish, and Italian! I love seeing them be parents. It’s crazy how we grow up and have children, and then watch the people we watched when we were little have babies. So happy for them.
ご両親の表情から幸せが溢れていて、とても嬉しい気持ちになりました

I lost my dad last year to cancer and watching the grandpa doting over Bjorn made me realize that one day if I have a child he/she won't have a grandpa to dote over them. It was a bittersweet feeling watching that scene. :')

This is as wholesome as anything can get! Bjorn is adorable (he's almost always smiling in the video, dunno if it's the editing cutting out when he gets fussy, but he seems like he's the happiest boy on earth <3), he looks a lot like Felix, and like Marzia as well and he is also such a beautiful baby! So happy for you that everything is going great!

That smile when he sees his mama and when he sees his papa just shows what great parents they are to their sweet bub! So great to see Felix and family thriving and happy! 7:14 precious picture of Grandpa and the cutest baby boy ever!

14:35〜
I'm Japanese🇯🇵
Anpanman is a character with a bread face It's an anime where you learn about ``self-sacrifice'' to help people in need by sharing bread For Japanese people, this anime is more well-known than One Piece or Naruto.
In Japanese nursery schools, children watch Anpanman almost every day, so children in Japan naturally develop a spirit of helping others.
This is a recommended anime
一時の平穏。日本を選んでくれてありがとう！
I still can't believe this. I get happy watching how far and grown up Felix has become. I love these vlogs, thank you for sharing Felix, Marzia and Bjorn
Björn is such a happy little guy...you can tell he and his dad both adore one another...congratulations on a beautiful family!
You literally can’t not get emotional from this video- been watching since i was 10 i turned 24 yesterday, and the journey of growing up with Felix and Marzia had been incredible so far️
まさか見慣れた川崎駅周辺の光景が出るとは
I swear Bjorn is the happiest looking baby I've ever seen in my life! Great work you two!
2:29 Edgar living his best retired life
As a Japanese, I love to see your family happy in Japan. I feel happy too.🇯🇵
久しぶりに見に来たらお子さんすくすく育っててほっこりした
Pewds is proof that it does get better. He went from gaming in his room all day, to starting a family and moving to Japan.
it so fun to see the little guy grow up
Bjorn is so adorable I CAN’T STAND IT! What a loving family he has too.
とにかくベビーがかわいすぎる
their happy little life is so contagious, smiled throughout the video. so happy and satisfying to see them all thriving
With all these influencers celebrating money and fame it’s nice to see one celebrating family and self improvement.

These 2 could be the happiest people ever. And I'd still smile along side them. Makes you realize we all got to watch these 2 become the happiest people with their child in a place where they are enjoying their new life together.
日本を楽しんでくれてるの凄い嬉しいし和むなぁ
I love how Bjorn is such a smiley baby you guys deserve all the joy in the world this year! Happy new year!
Beautiful lil boy, it makes me miss when my toddler was a small lil puffy baby. Thanks for the precious moments you share, its genuinely beautiful.
2:13 is so adorable he's a lovely father <33

I've been watching pewds since I was in 5th grade and now I'm working as a nurse. How time has flown and it just puts a smile to my face how happy he is right now as a father and husband. I grew up watching his content and seeing this was just so wholesome
This family vlog is pure joy to watch. Bjorn is growing up so fast and it's incredible to see him exploring and learning. You have such a wonderful family!
I’m Japanese and live in Japan but You remind me how beautiful Japan is.
“He looks just like you” a devious but loving father.

ピューディーパイを通して見る日本は美しいね️
自分の住んでる国を改めて好きになれる
I lowkey cried when Bjorn wam playing with his grandparents ngl He's the cutest baby ever
It just occurred to me the Bjorn will potentially know like 4 languages. Japanese, English, Swedish, and Italian.

pewds and marzia are the epitome of "And the Universe said I love you because you are love"
I dont think I've ever felt this much happiness from another persons happiness

I randomly thought of Pewdiepie this morning, after I haven’t seen him on social media in such a long time… I am so happy to see him and his little family thriving! Keep it going bro, you’re wonderful
I can feel how proud you are of Björn, he is such a cute baby. Thank you for sharing this with us, i feel blessed just by watching this, may his life be full of happiness and good health.

HIS LAUGH   
Felix I can’t unsee how much you look Just like your Dad!! That’s INSANE. I’m out of words to say of how grateful and blessed I am for knowing you and Marzia this long. Cheers to you both!
glad to see Klopp well after the announcement!

I started watching pewds when I was suuuuupper young. It’s crazy to see him as a dad. When I started watching his videos when he started creating content, he was as old as I am now. At that point I thought he was a grown adult. Just crazy to think abt. So happy for their little family.
this makes me so happy, im so glad to be a part of this journey
Imagine Björn could learn English, Italian, Swedish and Japanise so quick. He's gonna be an amazing person. Just like Felix and Marzia. ️️️
Felix living the life we all wish we had. He has truly won in life and im so happy for him.
なんか涙が出そうなぐらい癒される

Thia video got me so emotional, therye such a happy family. Bjorn is growing so fast, his face changes in every clip  and Marzia and Felix are such a cute couple. I feel like theyre enjoying their life more than ever rn, feels like theyre on retirement and fully living it to the max
Watching the young lords growth brings tears to my eyes
Björn is so cute pewds, seeing the pewdiepie family together in japan is amazing.i hope more vlogs appear with Björn

素敵ですね本当に可愛い赤ちゃん
成長が楽しみですね️
Bjorn is getting so big so quick! Love to watch him grow! Reminds me of when my daughter was a baby, hang on tight it’s over before you know it. Next thing you know it’s potty training and pre-school
3:15 Pewds roasting his son so bad
Man you are actually just living the best life you can. God bless dude.

Been watching Felix for a long while, its still so surreal to see how much he has grown up. It makes me so happy to see where life has led him, and seeing him become a proud, loving dad. Melts my heart. Whatever the future has for you, I hope and wish nothing but the best for your family.
